text: Seán Treacy (22 September 1923 - 23 March 2018)Profile of Seán Treacy was a former Irish politician. He was the Ceann Comhairle (chairman) of Dáil Éireann from 1973 to 1977 and from 1987 to 1997. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 1981 to 1984, replacing Eileen Desmond who resigned as an MEP when she was appointed Minister for Health and Social Welfare. Treacy died on 23 March 2018 in Clonmel, Ireland at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== *European Parliament profile Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of Dáil Éireann Category:MEPs for Ireland
title: Seán Treacy
